errors.error_description: The source path for the local settings file template is incorrect ('settings/local.dst' instead of 'config/settings/local.dst'), causing a 'file not found' error when the user tries to copy it.
correction_candidates: Change the source path from 'settings/local.dst' to 'config/settings/local.dst'.
Create a new file 'config/settings/local.py' manually and copy the contents from the main settings file.
Run a script to generate the local settings file automatically.
Change the destination path to 'settings/local.py' to match the source directory.
errors.golden_answer: Change the source path from 'settings/local.dst' to 'config/settings/local.dst'.
